data.name: Língua Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Listen to the regional sound of Brazil's northeast mixed with classic game OST's in this heartwarming soundtrack!

The soundtrack is available on all streaming services, this package is for players to support Língua's designer and composer.

Thank you so much for your support!
